channel.title: What's allowed here?
channel.description:
This is a new board relating to guides that users can post for RS2007. You're generally allowed to post any form of guide in here at all, as long as it relates to the game itself, if your guide is for EoC RuneScape, visit [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,254.0.html]this board[/url] and post it there instead. Please make your post as informative as possible, not just a 5 line thread telling someone to do this or that. [b]Do not request a guide in here[/b], this is only for the posting of guides, not the requesting. If the guide is not your work give credits where it's due otherwise it will be locked, these rules are to be used in compliance with the [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,354311.0.html]global rules[/url] just like every other board.
Regards, MoparScape Staff.

item.title: What's allowed here?
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

This is a new board relating to guides that users can post for RS2007. You’re generally allowed to post any form of guide in here at all, as long as it relates to the game itself, if your guide is for EoC RuneScape, visit this board and post it there instead. Please make your post as informative as possible, not just a 5 line thread telling someone to do this or that. Do not request a guide in here, this is only for the posting of guides, not the requesting. If the guide is not your work give credits where it’s due otherwise it will be locked, these rules are to be used in compliance with the global rules just like every other board.

Regards,
MoparScape Staff.
